name: Why Japan is Good for Job?
text: Japan as a whole has a reputation for being a hard-working country, with a strict work ethic and loyal employees. However, whether or not this dedication pays off in the countrys productivity is debatable, when comparing Japan to parts of the world less known for their worth ethic but still manage high productivity. Apart from job stability, Japanese company also offer decent employee benefits like medical care, pension, some cases travelling too.
